title: Can riot see your password or your past passwords?
body: I was just wondering if Riot could see your password or any past passwords you have had...?

replies.body: Nope!  The only person who can see your password is you.  Be wary of anyone asking you for it!  Check out our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) as well to make sure your info is safe in and outside of league!
